programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Fire Engine / Paddington Joins a Club) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Fire Engine / Paddington Joins a Club»Paddington is impressed by a safety talk from the local fire brigade. When there is a real emergency, Paddington to the rescue! // Mateo and Judy form a secret club in the treehouse but won't let Jonathan and Paddington join without a password.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Builds a Scarecrow / Paddington Plays Hide and Seek) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Paddington Builds a Scarecrow / Paddington Plays Hide and Seek»Paddington accidentally ruins Mr. Browns lovely lawn and must repair it. But the birds take a liking to the seeds so he builds a Scarecrow. // Mrs. Bird is a champion hide and seeker but where is she? Paddington, Jonathan and Judy mus go find her.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et Lucky) S1 (26/54)
programme.desc: «Paddington et Lucky»Paddington meets Mateo's dog Lucky! Paddington tries to teach him tricks, but Lucky will not behave. It's Love Day in Windsor Gardens!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le club secret) S3 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Le club secret»Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club - going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le chantier naval de papy Rabbit) S3 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Le chantier naval de papy Rabbit»Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Le dauphin est le meilleur ami des Guppies) S3 (25/26)
programme.desc: «Le dauphin est le meilleur ami des Guppies»Molly and Gil meet Buddy, a baby dolphin with the friendliest face in the sea! Today is Buddy's first birthday, and his pod is throwing him a surprise birthday party! Can the Guppies lead Buddy to the party?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Une soirée pyjama avec Blue) S1 (18/20)
programme.desc: «Une soirée pyjama avec Blue»It's a special nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do for her first pajama party. While we play Blue's Clues we learn about why it gets dark and light outside and which animals prefer the nighttime.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Les Rythmes de Blue) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Les Rythmes de Blue»Josh starts a band and uses Blue's Clues to find out which instrument Blue wants to play.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Comet Cupcakes / Tina's New Friend) S2 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Comet Cupcakes / Tina's New Friend»The crew help Capt. Sprinkles find a flower to make his special cupcakes but when Escarlata steals it they must get it back.// While trying to stop Bonnie Bones, Tina accidentally gets separated and makes a new friend in the form of an ancient robot!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (La disparition de la boussole magique) S1 (18/21)
programme.desc: «La disparition de la boussole magique»Santiago is on a mad dash to get his compass back after it's nabbed by Bonnie Bones and Sir Butterscotch.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Best in Flow) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Best in Flow»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La punaise d'eau) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «La punaise d'eau»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Freeze Pops) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Freeze Pops»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat' Patrouille sauve un lamantin / Un petit-déjeuner mouvementé) S6 (10/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille sauve un lamantin / Un petit-déjeuner mouvementé»Farmer Al and Farmer Yumi need help from the PAW Patrol to a get a manatee to the swamp. // Mr. Porter and Alex are in a sticky situation - they're up to their ears in maple syrup! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save the Porter's and Breakfast!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (L'artiste Paddington) S2 (1/27)
programme.desc: «L'artiste Paddington»Paddington the Artist: Mrs. Brown wants Windsor Gardens to artistically express themselves. Paddington doesn't know what art is, so he sets out to find what he's good at!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Sleepover) S2 (n°51)
programme.desc: «Sleepover»Peppa is going for a sleepover at Zoë Zebra's house. Suzy Sheep, Rebecca Rabbit, Candy Cat and Emily Elephant are all coming to the sleepover too. The girls are are too excited to go to sleep. They stay up playing games and having fun. They play songs on a piano, have a midnight feast and take it in turns to tell a story. At last they feel sleepy. They all snuggle up in their sleeping bags and fall asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les étoiles) S2 (49/52)
programme.desc: «Les étoiles»Il fait nuit et le ciel est rempli d'étoiles. Maman Pig et Papa Pig font enfiler à Peppa et George leur manteau par-dessus leur pyjama et sortent avec eux pour les observer. Grâce à un télescope, Papa Pig montre aux enfants comment trouver l'étoile du Nord...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Travailler et s'amuser) S3 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Travailler et s'amuser»When Peppa and Suzy learn that grown ups must work all day, they decide to play at working in a store. But they quickly get tired of it.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Trip to the Moon) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «The Trip to the Moon»Christopher dreams to visit the moon so his friends make his wish come true. Bubu makes a rocket ship in cardboard and the friends make Christopher an outfit with everything he will need during the trip to the moon.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Spider) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «The Spider»Anna and Froga are completely freaked out when they learn a spider lives in Ron's treehouse with him! Ron tries his best to convince his friends that the spider is harmless.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Une berceuse pour Blue) S2 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Une berceuse pour Blue»It's a nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite part of bedtime! As we search for clues, we help Blue and Polka Dots get clean, comfy, cozy and ready for bed.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue et les héros du quartier) S2 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Blue et les héros du quartier»Josh and Blue are Neighborhood Heroes, helping everyone they meet as they explore our neighborhood. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go in the neighborhood and make very important stop to make pizza with Mr. Oregano!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La forteresse en carton) S8 (17/24)
programme.desc: «La forteresse en carton»Pups Save a Box Fort: The Pups must save Rocky and Humdinger from a runaway box fort. (S8, ep 17a).

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Numéro de voltige de Lola / Le Monstre des égouts) S1 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Le Numéro de voltige de Lola / Le Monstre des égouts»Lola is worried her air display will not be impressive enough, but when Sir Steel joins, the air display goes wrong in a spectacular way! // When Sir Steel's dog Muffin's ball goes missing down the sewers, Bobbi has to face his fear of the dark.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les Super Clones / Mise en boîte) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Les Super Clones / Mise en boîte»In order to win the Citizen of the Year, Sir Steel and Professor Scratch create holograms doubles of Deer Squad who cause chaos all around. // It's Recycling Day and Sir Steel puts the whole town in cardboard boxes with his Box-ooka device.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Meets a Police Officer / Paddington and the Balloons) S1 (26/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Meets a Police Officer / Paddington and the Balloons»Jonathan has lost his balloon, Paddington tries to get him a new one but accidentally ends up flying all over London. How will he get down? Pigeonton get help! // After a neighborhood watch talk Paddington decides to go on patrol as an unofficial policeman. Soon he has to solve a real crime but who is the litterbug?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Mac and Cheese) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Mac and Cheese»Mac and Cheese: Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! (S1, ep 8a).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange) S1 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange»While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...»Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Best in Flow) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Best in Flow»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Une aventure de facteur / Les Shark sous les projecteurs) S1 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Une aventure de facteur / Les Shark sous les projecteurs»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Backwards Day) S1 (n°61)
programme.desc: «Backwards Day»Backwards Ron Day: Anna and Froga forgot that today is Ron's Day. There's nothing to eat and Christopher is missing! But, in the rush, everything is going wrong. (S1, ep 61).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Talking Flower) S1 (n°50)
programme.desc: «The Talking Flower»Anna would like to paint a new picture, and Ron his favourite flower: Jaunita. When Anna starts to paint Ron and his flower, Christopher hides behind a bush to trick him and make him believe the flower is a talking back to him.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Impatient Christopher) S1 (n°27)
programme.desc: «Impatient Christopher»Christopher can hardly wait for his birthday tomorrow, he delivers invitations to his friends, he tries to figure out what present they are preparing for him. Christopher learns that sleeping is the fastest way for tomorrow to come sooner!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Statue of Friendship) S1 (n°28)
programme.desc: «The Statue of Friendship»Anna is inspired to create a statue of Froga but she runs out of clay. On her search to find more, she and her friends agree to each make their own special statues out of different materials. The best statue to build is one they build together!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Amazing Guesser) S1 (n°51)
programme.desc: «The Amazing Guesser»The Amazing Guesser: After performing a backyard magic show with Ron, Christopher convinces himself that he actually has magical guessing powers! (S1, ep 51).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Robot Player) S1 (n°52)
programme.desc: «The Robot Player»Christopher has organized several games in the CLEARING for his friends to play. And the prize for each will be a TROPHY! The friends are super excited when Bubu brings his robot to play along with the group.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'arc en ciel) S3 (2/52)
programme.desc: «L'arc en ciel»Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La toux de Pedro) S3 (3/52)
programme.desc: «La toux de Pedro»Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and some of the other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Peppa calls Doctor Brown Bear who gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Jour de brume) S2 (18/52)
programme.desc: «Jour de brume»Peppa and George make everyone laugh when they dress up as Mama Pig and Papa Pig.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire de George) S2 (26/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire de George»Peppa's friend Pedro wears glasses. In addition, his father is an optician, so Pedro knows everything about glasses and eyes. According to Pedro, Peppa absolutely needs glasses. To see if that is really the case, Peppa can go to the optician ...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camion de Monsieur Fox) S3 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Le camion de Monsieur Fox»When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van - even a chicken!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe»Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright and Barbabelle who build a secret energy-consuming project.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie) S1 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie»Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le badge de course de Sparkle) S6 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Le badge de course de Sparkle»It's more Blaze family fun in this high octane, action-packed adventure as Blaze and his sister Sparkle team up to make it back to the Monster Dome in time for a big race.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La course de la Montagne Céleste) S6 (n°6)
programme.desc: «La course de la Montagne Céleste»At the starting line for Race to Sky High Mountain, one of Crusher's cheats threatens to sideline Blaze for good. To get back in this race, Blaze will need... Power Tires!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger) S9 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger»When Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties, an alarm is set off and the Paw Patrol must rescue them. // Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions - an aircraft and must be rescued from an out-of-control flight.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (L'anniversaire surprise d'Astrid / La Pat' Patrouille sauve une tour de pizzas) S5 (26/26)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire surprise d'Astrid / La Pat' Patrouille sauve une tour de pizzas»Ace's birthday and the puppies are building a nice birthday present for her. Mayor Humdinger wants the present himself. Adventure Bay wants to break the world record for highest pizza makers. But of course Mayor Humdinger wants that too.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les Nuages de couleur / La grande course) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Les Nuages de couleur / La grande course»Sir Steel is upset with Lola's sky art as it affects the popularity of his hat stand, so he tries to disperse her artwork. // The Deer Squad have a race to see whose cart is the fastest, but Sir Steel unexpectedly join in with his Steelmobile!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Fin de partie) S2 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Fin de partie»Lady Fluffpot hates mini-beasts - and Sir Steel creates MEGA-beasts that the Deer squad must deal with.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Fire Engine / Paddington Joins a Club) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Fire Engine / Paddington Joins a Club»Paddington is impressed by a safety talk from the local fire brigade. When there is a real emergency, Paddington to the rescue! // Mateo and Judy form a secret club in the treehouse but won't let Jonathan and Paddington join without a password.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Builds a Scarecrow / Paddington Plays Hide and Seek) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Paddington Builds a Scarecrow / Paddington Plays Hide and Seek»Paddington accidentally ruins Mr. Browns lovely lawn and must repair it. But the birds take a liking to the seeds so he builds a Scarecrow. // Mrs. Bird is a champion hide and seeker but where is she? Paddington, Jonathan and Judy mus go find her.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le phare de Papy Rabbit) S3 (36/52)
programme.desc: «Le phare de Papy Rabbit»Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jour de repos de mademoiselle Rabbit) S3 (37/52)
programme.desc: «Le jour de repos de mademoiselle Rabbit»Miss Rabbit has hurt her ankle, so her sister and her friends offer to fill in for her at the ice cream stand, the supermarket - and everywhere else she works!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le club secret) S3 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Le club secret»Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club - going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le chantier naval de papy Rabbit) S3 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Le chantier naval de papy Rabbit»Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Le dauphin est le meilleur ami des Guppies) S3 (25/26)
programme.desc: «Le dauphin est le meilleur ami des Guppies»Molly and Gil meet Buddy, a baby dolphin with the friendliest face in the sea! Today is Buddy's first birthday, and his pod is throwing him a surprise birthday party! Can the Guppies lead Buddy to the party?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Une soirée pyjama avec Blue) S1 (18/20)
programme.desc: «Une soirée pyjama avec Blue»It's a special nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do for her first pajama party. While we play Blue's Clues we learn about why it gets dark and light outside and which animals prefer the nighttime.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Les Rythmes de Blue) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Les Rythmes de Blue»Josh starts a band and uses Blue's Clues to find out which instrument Blue wants to play.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Comet Cupcakes / Tina's New Friend) S2 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Comet Cupcakes / Tina's New Friend»The crew help Capt. Sprinkles find a flower to make his special cupcakes but when Escarlata steals it they must get it back.// While trying to stop Bonnie Bones, Tina accidentally gets separated and makes a new friend in the form of an ancient robot!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (La disparition de la boussole magique) S1 (18/21)
programme.desc: «La disparition de la boussole magique»Santiago is on a mad dash to get his compass back after it's nabbed by Bonnie Bones and Sir Butterscotch.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Best in Flow) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Best in Flow»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La punaise d'eau) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «La punaise d'eau»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Freeze Pops) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Freeze Pops»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat' Patrouille sauve un lamantin / Un petit-déjeuner mouvementé) S6 (10/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille sauve un lamantin / Un petit-déjeuner mouvementé»Farmer Al and Farmer Yumi need help from the PAW Patrol to a get a manatee to the swamp. // Mr. Porter and Alex are in a sticky situation - they're up to their ears in maple syrup! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save the Porter's and Breakfast!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (L'artiste Paddington) S2 (1/27)
programme.desc: «L'artiste Paddington»Paddington the Artist: Mrs. Brown wants Windsor Gardens to artistically express themselves. Paddington doesn't know what art is, so he sets out to find what he's good at!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La lessive) S3 (10/52)
programme.desc: «La lessive»Papa Cochon suspend son maillot de foot propre pour le faire sécher, mais Peppa, George et maman l'éclaboussent de boue. Ils le mettent à tremper, mais Peppa rajoute sa robe rouge dans la bassine...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le voyage en bateau de Polly) S3 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Le voyage en bateau de Polly»Peppa et George partent en excursion en bateau avec Grand-Père Cochon, mais ils doivent envoyer Polly Parrot chercher de l'aide lorsque leur bateau s'échoue...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Delphine l'âne) S3 (12/52)
programme.desc: «Delphine l'âne»Delphine Donkey, une amie française de Peppa vient en visite. A la garderie, les animateurs et les enfants apprennent le chant "Bing Bong" à la Française.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Froga's Hat) S1 (n°29)
programme.desc: «Froga's Hat»Froga finds a sun hat she thought she lost forever and organizes a celebration picnic! But when the precious hat gets stained with jam, Froga's friends try to fix it - only making things worse. In the end, Anna's solution is the best of all.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Anna's Horse) S1 (n°30)
programme.desc: «Anna's Horse»Anna joins her friends to a game of riddle. Not only can she not "neigh" like a horse, she can't even make a loud sound. Bubu helps Anna with a Horse toy that makes the perfect "neigh" sound- perfect plan until they lose control of the toy!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen) S1 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen»Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Tourne un film avec Blue !) S2 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Tourne un film avec Blue !»Josh and Blue are making a movie and they need YOUR help! We play Blue's Clues to figure out the ending of our movie- what will wake Magenta up after a magic flower makes her fall asleep? While looking for clues, we help Rapunzel make her own movie.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La fête des lumières avec Blue) S3 (n°6)
programme.desc: «La fête des lumières avec Blue»Everyone's at Periwinkle's house celebrating Hanukkah! Well, not everyone, exactly. There's a special guest coming to our party! Who could it be?

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Steel Antlers / Berry Bad) S1 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Steel Antlers / Berry Bad»Sir Steel dons fake antlers to join the Deer Squad as they plan a surprise birthday party for Tina Turtle. // Sir Steel is infuriated when berries stain his new coat. Deer Squad must stop his mech-feet stamp stompers from destroying the berry bushes.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Traduitout / Le Concours de fleurs) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Le Traduitout / Le Concours de fleurs»Sir Steel unwittingly took over Bobbi's role to communicate with baby animals, with the help of his animal translator. // In his quest to win the Platinum City Flower Show, Sir Steel created super seeds that grow into gigantic mazes.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Chooses a Best Friend / Paddington and the Lamppost) S1 (21/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Chooses a Best Friend / Paddington and the Lamppost»Paddington wins a raffle and first prize is a meal for two at Sofia's café, but who is Paddington's BEST FRIEND? // Pigeonton has nested in a Lamppost outside Mr. Gruber's shop but the council have condemned it!

programme.title: Mini Chef (S'mores) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «S'mores»S'Mores: Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends. (S1, ep 4b).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Les sept aliments / Un portrait au poil»The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'arbre de Barbapapa / L'anniversaire des barbabébés) S1 (1/52)
programme.desc: «L'arbre de Barbapapa / L'anniversaire des barbabébés»Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le Sorcier Glacé) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Le Sorcier Glacé»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le Fort de l'Aquamitié / La punaise d'eau) S2 (n°201)
programme.desc: «Le Fort de l'Aquamitié / La punaise d'eau»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Bubu's New Blue Jeans) S1 (n°71)
programme.desc: «Bubu's New Blue Jeans»Christopher has prepared his annual obstacle race and is excited for all the friends to participate. Bubu's new blue jeans are still drying so he has to wear his brand-new pair to the event, he becomes overly concerned of getting them dirty.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Ron's Sunburn) S1 (n°55)
programme.desc: «Ron's Sunburn»Ron has gotten a terrible sunburn and is too embarrassed to come outside and play with his friends. They try everything they can think of to get him to play with them. They even try tempting him with Froga's freshly baked cookies!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Froga's Choice) S1 (n°33)
programme.desc: «Froga's Choice»Froga can't decide which boots to wear for today's group photo with her friends. Anna, Ron, and Bubu try to help her decide, but it makes her decision-making more difficult!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Great Friendship Show) S1 (n°34)
programme.desc: «The Great Friendship Show»The Great Friendship Show: Anna and her friends write a poem. Bubu prefers to paint. And the friends do so too. Froga is not so keen on painting. For Ron, it's poetry. (S1, ep 34).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Give-Away Day) S1 (n°45)
programme.desc: «Give-Away Day»Froga gets a new beautiful Sunflower Plant and decides to put it in her greenhouse. But she realizes that has been using her greenhouse to store all the items she doesn't know what to do with anymore. Now there's no room for her plant!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Funny Sounds) S1 (n°46)
programme.desc: «Funny Sounds»Silly Sounds: When he accidentally erases the 3 funny sounds that Christopher had on his recorder, Ron, decides to re-record them with the help of all his friends. (S1, ep 46).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête des pirates de Danny) S3 (16/52)
programme.desc: «La fête des pirates de Danny»C'est l'anniversaire de Danny Chien. Avec l'aide de grand-papa Chien et grand-père Cochon, les enfants se lancent à une chasse au trésor des pirates...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La visite de monsieur Patate) S3 (17/52)
programme.desc: «La visite de monsieur Patate»Tous les habitants de la ville sont ravis de rencontrer monsieur Patate qui arrive pour ouvrir un nouveau centre sportif...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les petites bêtes) S2 (21/52)
programme.desc: «Les petites bêtes»All kind of animals can be seen in Grandpa Pig's garden. At first Peppa is startled by a snail, but when she looks at it carefully, she wants to imitate it. And when Peppa's friends come too, the garden is full of little critters!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Jour de sport) S2 (15/52)
programme.desc: «Jour de sport»C'est jour de fête à la garderie et de nombreuses animations ont été organisées pour l'occasion. Papa Pig enseigne à Peppa que l'important n'est pas de gagner mais de participer...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le moulin à paroles) S3 (44/52)
programme.desc: «Le moulin à paroles»Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barba TV / Le muséum) S1 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Barba TV / Le muséum»The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...»Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Au secours du chiot) S6 (7/24)
programme.desc: «Au secours du chiot»The Puppy Chase!: When a big bubble floats away with Gabby's new puppy, she'll team up with Blaze and AJ to get him back. (S6, ep 8).

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le concours de construction) S6 (10/24)
programme.desc: «Le concours de construction»To compete in the Axle City Construction Contest, Blaze and his friends turn into construction vehicles! But when Crusher sends them far away, it'll take all of their construction skills combined to make it back before time runs out.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le Défilé de ballons géants / La Tarentule des cavernes) S6 (16/26)
programme.desc: «Le Défilé de ballons géants / La Tarentule des cavernes»The Turbot cousins try to spot a rare spider, but get stuck in its web. It's up to the PAW Patrol save the spider spies!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Des ours dans la ville / Madame Goodway à la ferme) S6 (17/26)
programme.desc: «Des ours dans la ville / Madame Goodway à la ferme»Bears are asleep all over town! The PAW Patrol must work quietly to save the bears and return them to their cave.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (L'attaque des drones / Pluie de slime) S1 (14/15)
programme.desc: «L'attaque des drones / Pluie de slime»Steel's automated delivery drones create chaos in the city and forest. Kai has to disable the drones real quick! // When Sir Steel's Slime Machine starts shooting slime everywhere, Bobbi has to pilot the Deer Squad Rescue Carrier to save the city.
